CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 31, 1959, pg. B2, reads: State NAACP Convenes in 3-Day Meet Here - "Mr. NAACP" - Atty. Thurgood Marshall during Sunday address, at mass meeting held in Wesley Center AME Zion Church.."
TitMainTitle: Thurgood Marshall speaking at podium in Wesley Center AME Zion Church, for NAACP 50th anniversary conference
CatSubject_tab: Marshall, Thurgood, 1908-1993. Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
